bomberman.title: Bomberman
bomberman.description: Modern SPA built with Vue 3 and Vite.

artPourVivre.title: Art pour Vivre Website
artPourVivre.description: This website was designed in HTML and CSS as part of a university project carried out in a team of three. The goal was to develop a showcase site for a fictional company in the events sector. We created "Art pour Vivre", a company specializing in organizing art exhibitions across France.

todoApp.title: Todo Application
todoApp.description: A task management application built with Vue 3, Vite, and using LocalStorage for data persistence.

lens-symphony-web.title: Site Web LensSymphony
lens-symphony-web.description: Réalisée en binôme, cette application JavaFX permet la gestion des données d’une station de traitement d’eau. Elle offre la possibilité de gérer les clients, leurs commandes et les informations associées. Ce projet m’a permis de renforcer mes compétences en conception d’interfaces et en structuration de données.

presentation.title: About me
presentation.description: My name is Romain THIBAUT, I am 19 years old and I am a second-year student studying Computer Science at the University Institute of Technology in Lens. I am currently looking for an internship starting on April 13 in the field of web development or application development.
